deepseek_optimized_prompt:
**AI Image Generation Prompt:**  

"Professional product photo of a pair of **medium dark blue slide sandals (size 7)**, made of high-quality rubber, showcasing their waterproof design. The sandals should be positioned slightly angled, one slightly overlapping the other, to highlight the texture and contours. Clean, modern styling with a focus on comfort and durability.  

**Photography Setup & Lighting:** Soft, diffused lighting to eliminate harsh shadows, with a slight rim light to accentuate the edges of the sandals. Use a 3-point lighting setup for balanced illumination, ensuring the blue color appears rich and true to life.  

**Background & Composition:** Minimalist, neutral-toned background (light gray or soft beige) to keep focus on the product. The sandals should be centered with slight negative space around them for a clean, ad-friendly composition. Optionally, a subtle water droplet effect on the sandals to emphasize waterproof functionality.  

**Colors & Mood:** The
